description: No-one will be allowed to enter the island from Friday morning in a bid to curb the spread of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to close borders in bid 'to preserve life'
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to close borders in bid 'to preserve life' - BBC News
maintext: He added: "Despite the excellent preparations across our own health and social care sectors, we need to accept that there is every likelihood that a moment will come where we are under these same pressures.
